properties.description: Estrae subset di colonne dal Parquet processed e scrive su curated.

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceProcessed
sourceProcessed select(mapColumn(
		pax_quantity,
		priceList,
		tickets_quantity,
		amount,
		visitDate,
		channel_label,
		transactionType_text
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCuratedFields
SelectCuratedFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sinkCuratedDaily
